label: Invoice of rice sales for Anthony Clarkson, 1762 Oct. 30.
description: An account of the "Sales of twenty-five whole and seven half tierces of rice imported in the brig Hawke...on account and risque of Mr. Anthony Clarkson of Charles Town South Carolina."

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: An account of the "Sales of twenty-five whole and seven half tierces of rice imported in the brig Hawke...on account and risque of Mr. Anthony Clarkson of Charles Town South Carolina."

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
Sales of Twenty five whole and seven half Tierces of 
Rice Imported in the Brig Hawke  George Snow Master 
on Account [and] Risque of Mr. Anthony Clarkson of Charles 
Town South Carolina
[in margin left] Time when sold 1760 Novem.
Purchaser Names Tierces of Rice No. of Do. Half Tierces of Rice no. of Do. Price SVD
[8] Samuel Elliott        3                1456					   at 25/  19.0 
[11] Christ.n Hodge    1	       469			                    at 27/ 6 11 7 1/2
[14]William Maxwell  2	       935				       at ditto 25/ 12 3 9
Nathaniel Gilbert         3	       1433				         at ditto   18 13 3
[15] George Savage				    1.			     250 at ditto    3 5  
Est.. of James Emra	1	        493					at ditto	6 8 3
[18]Es. Of Edward Otto Bayer 2    970					at ditto	12 12 6
Timothy Clerkley	2	        1000					at ditto	13 2 0
[19]Francis Farley	1	        492				          at ditto  	6 8  
Hunter Moorson 6.0    10	        6467	     6			        at 221  74 7 8 3/4
			25	        13723           7 			    250____ 172 12 4 4
					250
				         13973

1760		Charges on the above Sales _____Viz.__
Novem 21	To freight of 25 whole [and] 7 half Tierces of Rive w. 13973
		at 9 10 Jan Consisting of 3000. N._____________ 44" 4 11 1/2
		To Cooperage, Wharfage, and Porteridge a
		1800 Tr and half Fr. ________________ 82"2"2 9
		To my Commissions on 172"12"1/4 [at] 7/2 [?] 12"18"10 3/4 59 6 7 1/4
		To Anthony Clarkson his Account for [british pounds] 113 5 6
		the N. proceeds ______________________
			Antigua October 30th, 1762

				Errors Excepted
					Alex Willock
[See original document for exact figures]
[End Page 1]
Mr Alexander Willock
Antigua 83: 5: g
Alexander Willock
Sales of 32 bbls of Rice
Antigua
[End Page 2]
